title: Everygame 3 people are DC
body: Every game I'm in there are 3 people DC, they're all stuck in the middle of fountain or something

replies.body:
I'm having trouble connecting to the game even though my internet is fine. Says "Unable to Connect to the Server". Which I think it has to do with this.

So their I guess having the same problems as me.

RESTART YOUR PC

  YOUR PC DIDNT OPEN UP LEAGUE OF LEGEND PROPERLY SO IT SAID THAT. PLEASE GOSH RESTART YOUR PC AND IT SHOULD FIX IT!
